rooms.description: Entrance hall with ample natural light and ventilation
Spacious living area with a view of the central courtyard
Adjacent to the living room for seamless dining experience
Efficient layout with eco-friendly design, natural ventilation from the courtyard
Comfortable guest bedroom ensuring privacy and Vastu compliance
Larger master suite with attached bathroom for optimum comfort
Dedicated guest bathroom ensuring ease of use and privacy

openings.description: Large windows to maximize natural light while adhering to Vastu principles
Main entrance door with eco-friendly material and design for energy efficiency
Natural light windows ensuring proper ventilation and Vastu alignment
